attributes.action: put a condition on all new houses/flats built that they must be owner occupied and no part of the house/flat can be rented out, in perpetuity. This is to prevent a lot of affordable housing being bought by landlords and then rented out at a high rent and making getting onto the property ladder even more difficult.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Landlords are buying up a lot of first time buyers properties. This means less affordable housing available and by paying high rent, makes saving for a deposit extremely difficult.
